Text: More lies from David Irvine, a notorious holocaust denier. He has been successfully pursued in court and shown to be a liar and a fabricator of facts. Historical authorities have denounced his fabrications from one end of the globe to the other. This film continues his quest to defend the poor Nazis who aren't to blame for WWII, at least according to Irvine. A despicable man if there ever was one!
This documentary does not feature David Irvine.
An anti-semite used to be someone that disliked Jews...now it is someone Jews dislike. This video has nothing to do with David Irvine...unfortunately.
